text:
Producer-san, I'm sorry...!
Could I ask for a photo later...?
We want to take one around the entrance with everyone...!

Yeah, got it.
For commemorating the end of the training camp, huh?

Yes! I took quite a few photos with everyone during the camp,
so I thought I'd upload them all on Twesta.

Oh, I'll probably ask you to
check those later too...!

─ But Chiyoko is really dependable, huh?
Even at times like this, she never misses an update.

Aw, come on,
praise won't get you anything?
Oh, so chocolates will get you something.

Of course!
Because I'm the Chocolate Idol!

─ But seriously,
thank you for working so hard.

Not just during the camp, not just with Twista,
but for everything we do together like this.

Hehe...!
That's of course, or rather...

─ The Chocolate Idol of
HO-KA-GO CLIMAX GIRLS!
